Others: The Lakers lost their first game of the season to the Phoenix Suns with a score of 109-105.
JJ Redick took responsibility for the Lakers' 14-point second quarter and their hesitation in double-teaming Kevin Durant.
Anthony Davis finished with 29 points, 15 rebounds, and three blocks to lead the Lakers.
LeBron James struggled through a three-for-14 shooting night while dealing with an illness.
The Lakers made just one field goal in the final 3:30 of the game.
